procEffect.descriptionOverride:
Upon being hit, gain 5 Wrath.
This effect has a 5s cooldown.

When you critically hit, gain +10% Thrash damage for 10s.
This effect has a 20s cooldown.

From-stealth skills apply a 5% incoming damage debuff for 8s.
This effect has a 20s cooldown.

When you critically hit, there is a 25% chance you will reduce your target's critical defence by 10% for 15s.
This effect has a 30s cooldown.

Tricks will restore 5% of your max morale when used.
This effect has a 15s cooldown.

When you critically hit, there is a 25% chance your bonus damage from Mettle will be doubled for 10s.
This effect has a 30s cooldown.

When you critically hit, there is a 25% chance your Fervour bonus damage will be doubled for 10s.
This effect has a 30s cooldown.

When you critically hit, there is a 25% chance the cooldown of Battle-shout will be reset.
This effect has a 20s cooldown.

When you critically hit, your Mastery cooldowns are reduced by 2s.
This effect has a 5s cooldown.

When you hit an enemy, there is a 10% chance the cooldown of Force Opening will be reset.
This effect has a 15s cooldown.

When you critically hit, there is a 15% chance to trigger the Harsh Debate effect.
This effect has a 20s cooldown.

When you hit an enemy with a Fist gambit, there is a 50% chance you will apply a -3% Light Mitigation debuff for 20s.
This effect has a 30s cooldown.

When you critically hit, the active cooldown of Murder of Crows will be reduced by 2s.
This effect has a 5s cooldown.

When you hit an enemy, there is a 10% chance your Set-Up skills will give you +1 extra Mettle for 10s.
This effect has a 30s cooldown.

When you hit an enemy, there is a 5% chance you will gain +20% Ballad and Coda Damage for 10s.
This effect has a 30s cooldown.

When you use a Fire skill, there is a 50% chance you will apply an additional damaging burn.
This effect has a 25s cooldown.

When you critically hit, there is a 10% chance you will gain +3% Critical Chance for 15s.
This effect has a 45s cooldown.

When you critically hit, there is a 10% chance you will gain +30% Echoes Damage and +5% Healing over time for 15s.
This effect has a 30s cooldown.

When you hit an enemy with a Strike skill, there is a 10% chance you will gain an extra Fervour every second for 5s.
This effect has a 20s cooldown.

When you hit an enemy, there is a 10% chance you will apply a -3% Tactical Mitigation debuff for 20s.
This effect has a 30s cooldown.

When you hit an enemy, there is a 15% chance the cooldown of Heart Seeker will be reset.
This effect has a 30s cooldown.

When you hit an enemy, there is a 10% chance you will gain a defeat response.
This effect has a 30s cooldown.
